name: Aditi Sharma
message: The disciplined mock tests and instant doubt-solving at Catalyst kept me consistent. The mentors tracked every small improvement.

name: Harshit Bansal
message: Physics and Maths problem practice here is next level. The analysis after each test showed exactly where I lost marks.

name: Nidhi Rawat
message: Focused agricultural entrance material and one-to-one guidance for forms and counselling reduced all my stress.

name: Rohan Mehta
message: The 9-10 foundation program explained every NCERT concept clearly. Regular tests made the final board exam feel familiar.
